title: Genomic characterization of
abstract: Susceptibility testing to 10 antipseudomonal agents was done by MicroScan WalkAway broth microdilution system. WGS was performed using the Illumina DNA Prep library preparation kit. Indexed libraries were sequenced on an Illumina MiSeq benchtop sequencer (300 base pairs paired-end reads). The most common loss-of-function mutations occurred in genes encoding the MexAB-OprM efflux-pump system, the pvd cluster and the fpvA receptor, and genes involved in twitching motility such as  Our data indicates that
